title: Code Library & Templates
subtitle: Ready-to-use code snippets for accessible academic content
intro: This library provides copy-paste ready code examples for implementing accessibility standards in your academic publications. All examples follow WCAG 2.2 Level AA guidelines.

accessible.title: Accessible LaTeX Template
accessible.description: Complete LaTeX document template with accessibility features

tables.title: Accessible LaTeX Tables
tables.description: Properly structured tables with clear headers

matplotlib.title: Matplotlib Accessible Plots
matplotlib.description: Create colorblind-safe charts with proper contrast

seaborn.title: Seaborn Accessible Styling
seaborn.description: Configure seaborn with accessible color palettes

ggplot.title: ggplot2 Accessible Themes
ggplot.description: Custom ggplot2 theme with accessibility features

typography.title: Accessible Typography
typography.description: CSS rules for readable text with proper spacing

colors.title: CSS Color Variables
colors.description: Okabe-Ito palette as CSS custom properties

darkMode.title: Accessible Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Dark mode implementation with sufficient contrast

article.title: Semantic Article Structure
article.description: Properly structured HTML article with ARIA labels

figures.title: Accessible Figure Markup
figures.description: HTML structure for figures with captions and alt text

tables.title: Accessible HTML Tables
tables.description: Data tables with proper headers and scope

items.copy: Copy the code snippets directly into your project
items.modify: Modify colors, fonts, and values to match your style
items.test: Test with screen readers and colorblind simulation tools
items.validate: Validate HTML and check WCAG compliance
items.document: Document any accessibility features you implement

comments.accessibleChart: Accessible chart with color and patterns
comments.okabeColors: Okabe-Ito colors and various line styles
comments.okabeItoUsage: Use Okabe-Ito palette: Select colorblind-safe colors
comments.dualEncoding2: Dual encoding: Combine color + pattern/line style
comments.directLabeling4: Direct labeling: Display values on all data points
comments.clearBorders: Clear borders: Distinguish elements with 2px black borders
comments.includeMetadata: Include metadata: Add descriptions when saving SVG/PDF
comments.ariaLabels: ARIA labels: Add accessibility attributes to interactive charts
